hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Al-Malih [??]:We were with Buraida in a battle on a cloudy day and he said, "Offer the `Asr prayer early as the Prophet said, "Whoever leaves the `Asr prayer, all his (good) deeds will be annulled

chapter.eng-name: One who omits (does not offer) the 'Asr prayer (intentionally)
